original: nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de me'i mkha'i khams ma yin no //üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de me'i mkha'i khams ma yin no // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no //
translated: The space element is not bound and not freed.üîΩThe consciousness element is not bound and not freed.

original: ma rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no //
translated: Ignorance is not bound and not freed.

original: 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no //
translated: Formations are not bound and not freed.üîΩConsciousness is not bound and not freed.

original: rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no; ;ming dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no; ;ming dang gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ming dang gzugs ma yin no //
translated: Name and form are not bound and not freed.

original: skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug gi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no //
translated: The six sense sources are not bound and not freed.

original: reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no //
analyzed: reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no //
translated: Contact is not bound and not freed.

original: tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no //üîΩsred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang @52a *//
analyzed: tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no // sred pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang @52a *//
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of feeling is not feeling.

original: yin pa de sred pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yin pa de sred pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of craving is not craving.

original: len pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no //
analyzed: len pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of appropriation is not appropriation.

original: srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: srid pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of existence is not existence.

original: skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of birth is not birth.

original: rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no //
analyzed: rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of old age and death is not old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation of the perfection of morality is not the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation that is the perfection of patience is not the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation that is the perfection of effort is not the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation that is the perfection of meditation is not the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yan pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //üîΩnang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yan pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no // nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation that is the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThe non-bondage, non-liberation that is inner emptiness is not inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage, non-liberation that is outer emptiness is not outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings @52b ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings @52b ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of great immensity.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThat which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.üîΩThat which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: That which is neither fettered nor liberated is not the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of what transcends limits is not the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless is not the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of what is not to be discarded is not the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is not the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of all things is not the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //üîΩmi dmigs @53a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no // mi dmigs @53a *//
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of defining characteristics is not the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.üîΩThe unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of things is not the emptiness of things.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of nonthings is not the emptiness of nonthings.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of essential nature is not the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The unfettered and unbound nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings is not the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness is not bound and is not freed.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong pa rnams ma yin no //üîΩrdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de yang dag par spong pa rnams ma yin no // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the right efforts is not bound and is not freed.üîΩThe suchness of the legs of miraculous power is not bound and is not freed.

original: dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the faculties is not bound and is not freed.

original: stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the powers is not bound and is not freed.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the branches of awakening is not bound and is not freed.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin @53b no; ;'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin @53b no; ;'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin
translated: The noble truths are not bound and are not freed.

original: no // bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: no // bsam gtan rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin no //
translated: The concentrations are not bound and are not freed.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The immeasurables are not bound and are not freed.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The formless absorptions are not bound and are not freed.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin no //
translated: The eight deliverances are not bound and are not freed.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the nine serial absorptions is not the nine serial absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation is not the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the higher perceptions is not the higher perceptions.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways is not the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang @54a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang @54a *//
translated: It is the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas being neither fettered nor liberated.üîΩ

original: yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no //
analyzed: yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas is not bound and is not freed.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the four fearlessnesses is not bound and is not freed.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no //üîΩbyams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma yin no // byams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges is not bound and is not freed.üîΩThe suchness of great love is not bound and is not freed.

original: snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of great compassion is not bound and is not freed.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol pa nyid gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no //
translated: The suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not bound and is not freed.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the fruit of stream enterer is not the fruit of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the fruit of once-returner is not the fruit of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the fruit of non-returner is not the fruit of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the state of a worthy one is not the state of a worthy one.

original: rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang byang chub ma yin no //
analyzed: rang byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rang byang chub ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening is not a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid @54b ma yin no //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid @54b ma yin no //
translated: The non-bondage and non-liberation of the knowledge of path aspects is not the knowledge of path aspects.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no //
translated: The unconditioned is not the unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening of the bodhisattvas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs ni /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs ni /
translated: It is because form

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: is utterly pure.

original: tshor ba ni /
analyzed: tshor ba ni /
translated: Feeling is

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: utterly pure.

original: 'du shes ni /

translated: The knowledge of all aspects is

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: very pure.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subh≈´ti, thus

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams la chos @57a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams la chos @57a *//
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they teach the doctrine to sentient beings, saying,üîΩ‚ÄúCome here, son of a good family!üîΩ

original: ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so //
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they teach the Dharma to sentient beings, but they do not apprehend sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings

original: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la de mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la de mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
translated: do not apprehend any phenomena, and they do not apprehend non-apprehension.

original: gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: They do not apprehend the emptiness of form, and they do not apprehend the emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /üîΩyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ro stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ro stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way the eye does not abide in emptiness, the way the ear does not abide in emptiness, the way the nose does not abide in emptiness, the way the tongue does not abide in emptiness, the way the body does not abide in emptiness,üîΩthe way the mind does not abide in emptiness, the way forms do not abide in emptiness, the way sounds do not abide in emptiness, the way smells do not abide in emptiness, the way tastes do not abide in emptiness,

original: reg stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: reg stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the way textures do not abide in emptiness, the way mental phenomena do not abide in emptiness, the way eye consciousness does not abide in emptiness, the way ear consciousness does not abide in emptiness,

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / @57b yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / @57b yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the mind consciousness does not endure.üîΩthe emptiness of eye contact does not endure,üîΩthe emptiness of ear contact does not endure,üîΩthe emptiness of nose contact does not endure,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of tongue contact does not endure,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is to teach the emptiness of the composite of the body in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the composite of the mind in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the eye in a way that is not dwelling.üîΩIt is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the ear in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the nose in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the tongue in a way that is not dwelling.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: It is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the body in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the sensation that arises from the composite of contact through the mind in a way that is not dwelling. It is to teach the emptiness of the earth element in a way that is not dwelling.

original: chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: and the element of consciousness is emptiness in the sense of not being a basis.

original: ma rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa @58a *//
analyzed: ma rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa @58a *//
translated: Ignorance is emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,üîΩformations are emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,üîΩconsciousness is emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,üîΩname and form are emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,

original: nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the six sense sources are emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,üîΩcontact is emptiness in the sense of not being a basis,

original: tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of feeling is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of craving is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of appropriation is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of becoming is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of birth is the way of nonabiding,

original: rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of old age and death is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of the perfection of generosity is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of the perfection of conduct is the way of nonabiding, the emptiness of the perfection of patience is the way of nonabiding,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /üîΩnang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang; stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the perfection of effort is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, the perfection of meditation is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, the perfection of wisdom is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding,üîΩinner emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, outer emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, inner and outer emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, emptiness that is a non-entity is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, emptiness that is a non-non-entity is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi @58b gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi @58b gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, ultimate emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, conditioned emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, unconditioned emptiness is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding, the emptiness of what transcends limits is emptiness in the sense of non-abiding,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of non-rejection in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of nature in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of all phenomena in terms of non-abiding,üîΩthe emptiness of its own mark in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of non-apprehension in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of non-things in terms of non-abiding, the emptiness of essential nature in terms of non-abiding,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things in terms of non-abiding.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the nature of non-entities does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the correct exertions does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the supports for miraculous abilities does not endure in that way,

original: dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the faculties does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the powers does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment does not endure in that way, the emptiness of the noble eightfold path does not endure in that way,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the noble truths does not endure, the emptiness of the meditative concentrations does not endure, the emptiness of the immeasurable aspirations does not endure, and the emptiness of the formless absorptions does not endure.

original: rnam @59a *// par thar pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rnam @59a *// par thar pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the liberations does not endure, the emptiness of the serial absorptions does not endure, and the emptiness of the gateways to liberation‚Äîemptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness‚Äîdoes not endure.

original: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding meditative stabilization, the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding ten tathƒÅgata powers, the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding four detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding great love, the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding great compassion, and the emptiness of the way of abiding of non-abiding eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
translated: the state of a worthy one in the mode of nonabiding emptiness,üîΩa pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening in the mode of nonabiding emptiness,üîΩthe knowledge of path aspects in the mode of nonabiding emptiness,

original: rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
analyzed: rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects in the mode of nonabiding emptiness.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams @59b ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams @59b ni /
translated: There is no conditioned or unconditioned dharma

original: gang yang gnas pa med do //
analyzed: gang yang gnas pa med do //
translated: that abides anywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te /
translated: Because the intrinsic nature of anything that might abide is not apprehended.

original: dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so //
translated: A nonthing does not abide in a nonthing.

original: rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so //
translated: The intrinsic nature does not stand in the intrinsic nature.

analyzed: gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo //

translated: ‚ÄúHow do bodhisattva great beings realize the defining characteristics of phenomena?‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor / sprul pa ni /üîΩ'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / sprul pa ni / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, an emanationüîΩdoes not engage in desire, anger, or ignorance.

original: bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in latent tendencies or the afflictive emotions.

original: phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩzag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do // zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in outer or inner phenomena.üîΩIt does not engage in defiled or undefiled phenomena.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in conditioned or unconditioned phenomena.

original: gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩtshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do // tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in form.üîΩIt does not engage in feeling.

original: 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in perception.

original: 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: It does not engage in formation.

original: rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in consciousness.

original: mig la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: mig la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the eyes.

original: rna ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩsna la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba la yongs su spyod pa med do // sna la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the ears.üîΩHe does not indulge in the nose.

original: lce la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lce la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the tongue.

original: lus la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lus la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the body.

original: yid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: yid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the thinking-mind.

original: gzugs la yongs su spyod @83b pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la yongs su spyod @83b pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in sights.

original: sgra la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩdri la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: sgra la yongs su spyod pa med do // dri la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in sounds.üîΩHe does not indulge in smells.

original: ro la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: ro la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in tastes.

original: reg la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: reg la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in touchables.

original: chos la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: chos la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in thoughts.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩsna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do // sna'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in ear consciousness.üîΩHe does not indulge in nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the consciousness of the body.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the consciousness of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible form, and the consciousness of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do // sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear, a sound, and the consciousness of the ear.üîΩHe does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the nose, a smell, and the consciousness of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the tongue, a taste, and the consciousness of the tongue.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the body, a tangible object, and the consciousness of the body.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the contact that arises from the coming together of the mind, a mental object, and the consciousness of the mind.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the eye, a visible form, and the consciousness of the eye.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the ear, a sound, and the consciousness of the ear.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the sensation that arises from the contact that arises from the coming together of the nose, a smell, and the consciousness of the nose.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the feelings that arise from the contact of the tongue with taste.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the feelings that arise from the contact of the body with touch.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med @84a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med @84a *//
translated: He does not indulge in the feelings that arise from the contact of the mind with mental objects.

original: do; ;sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: do; ;sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the water element.

original: me'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩrlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: me'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do // rlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the fire element.üîΩHe does not indulge in the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in the consciousness element.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in dependent origination.

original: ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in ignorance.

original: 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not indulge in consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod ba med do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod ba med do //
translated: He does not review name-and-form.

original: skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review the six sense fields.

original: reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review contact.

original: tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩsred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do // sred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review feeling.üîΩHe does not review craving.

original: len pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩsrid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: len pa la yongs su spyod pa med do // srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review grasping.üîΩHe does not review becoming.

original: skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review birth.

original: rga shi la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rga shi la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do; ;bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do; ;bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: He does not review the perfection of perseverance. He does not review the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩnang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do // nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThey do not practice inner emptiness,

original: phyi @84b stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: phyi @84b stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice ultimate emptiness,üîΩthey do not practice conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice unconditioned emptiness,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice the emptiness of what is beyond limits,üîΩthey do not practice the emptiness of no beginning and no end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not practice the emptiness of nonrepudiation,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of essential nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of specific characteristics.üîΩThey do not practice the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //üîΩdbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do // dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the legs of miraculous power.üîΩThey do not practice the faculties.

original: stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: They do not practice the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med @85a *//
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med @85a *//
translated: they do not engage with the factors of awakening,

original: do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not engage with the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not engage with the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
translated: they do not engage with the meditative concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do //
